dc:title: Review of In Solitary Witness (cont.)
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Continues to give details of Franz Jagerstatter's resistance to the Nazi regime. Admires his solitary, almost unnoticed, witness. See him as a beacon for conscientious objectors in the Vietnam era.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 829 1965-07-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
